column1: Baby Barnaby's////I went recently for a late birthday brunch with a friend I haven't seen in a while. Even though it was technically "brunch"
column2: my friend insisted I get something from the drink menu to celebrate my new ability to purchase alcohol. When we asked the server for two strawberry mimosas
column4: which is normal. But the server didn't just check the ID
column7: and turned them over and stared some more. She then walked away with both of our IDs and didn't come back for 15 minutes. When she came back
column8: she hid our IDs with her hands and demanded we recite our drivers license numbers.
